table.name: vtiger_equipmentavailability
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_equipmentavailability` ( `equipmentavailabilityid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `equi_avail_percent` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`equipmentavailabilityid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_equipmentavailabilitycf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_equipmentavailabilitycf` ( `equipmentavailabilityid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`equipmentavailabilityid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
